------------------------------------------------------------
  Welcome to the Multi-Exponent Oracle  (oracle-ml-gcd)
------------------------------------------------------------
This oracle uses a fixed RSA modulus n and a secret flag m.
Each time you ask for an encryption, it chooses a fresh public
exponent e and returns c = m^e mod n.

Rumor says the exponents follow some hidden pattern...
Can you recover the flag using a few ciphertexts?
